original: intros s i Hsorted Hsize x0. generalize dependent i. induction s as [| x xs IHs]. - intros. inversion Hsize. - intros. destruct i as [| i'] eqn:Eqi. + simpl. apply (sorted_head _ 0). auto. + simpl in Hsize. apply Nat.succ_lt_mono in Hsize. apply IHs; try auto. apply sorted_incr with (j := 0); auto.
